summary: An examination of the malevolent London underworld with its despicable criminal underground. Ray (Mick Rossi) just finished an eight-year prison sentence after getting set up. Now he is back on the streets to settle the score.
cast: Val Kilmer|Gabriel Byrne|Vinnie Jones|Anthony LaPaglia|Bruno Kirby|Mick Rossi|Nick Simunek|Caspar von Winterfeldt|Patsy Kensit|Trevor Nugent|Sean Power|George Berg|Joanne Whalley|Imran Ahktar|Nigel Mead|Sile Bermingham|Steve Jones|Roy Dotrice|Adam Fogerty|Emma Ryan|Andy Nyman|Pipo Chiu|Aaron Gallagher|Marc Siciliani|Luca Palanca|John Jones|Patrick Bergin|Meredith Ostrom|Sergio Kato
title: Jugando sucio
